title: Add clickable phone contact link to footer Support section

requirements.summary: Update the footer Support/Contact Us area to show the phone number as a clickable tel: link.
acceptanceCriteria: In the footer Support section (frontend/src/components/SiteFooter.tsx), the phone number 1-242-821-0504 is visible to users.
The phone number is rendered as a clickable link using href="tel:+12428210504" (or equivalent) and is readable in both light and dark themes.
No other footer sections (Services, Quick Links, Connect) regress visually or functionally.

file_operations.description: Replace the existing non-interactive "Contact Us" support item with a visible phone number "1-242-821-0504" rendered as an anchor using a tel: href (use the E.164 form +12428210504 in the href). Apply existing footer link/typography classes so it remains readable in light/dark themes and does not alter layout/behavior of the other footer columns.
